title: travelplanner: Can you help formulate a 3-day travel plan for 2 people, starting from Los Angeles and heading to Detroit, from March 18th to March 20th, 2022? Our total budget for the trip is $2,000. For accommodations, we need places that allow visitors. Also, we're looking for opportunities to savor diverse cuisines, including Chinese, Indian, Mexican, and Italian. We prefer not to self-drive during the journey. (782ea2316c632981)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Can you help formulate a 3-day travel plan for 2 people, starting from Los Angeles and heading to Detroit, from March 18th to March 20th, 2022? Our total budget for the trip is $2,000. For accommodations, we need places that allow visitors. Also, we're looking for opportunities to savor diverse cuisines, including Chinese, Indian, Mexican, and Italian. We prefer not to self-drive during the journey.

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular attractions in Detroit:

1. **Detroit Institute of Arts**
   - Address: 5200 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48202, USA
   - Phone: (313) 833-7900
   - Website: [dia.org](https://dia.org/)

2. **Detroit Historical Museum**
   - Address: 5401 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48202, USA
   - Phone: (313) 833-1805
   - Website: [detroithistorical.org](http://detroithistorical.org/detroit-historical-museum/plan-your-visit/general-information)

3. **Campus Martius Park**
   - Address: 800 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48226, USA
   - Phone: (313) 566-8250
   - Website: [downtowndetroitparks.com](https://downtowndetroitparks.com/parks/campus-martius/)

4. **Motown Museum**
   - Address: 2648 Berry Gordy Jr. Boulevard, 2648 W Grand Blvd, Detroit, MI 48208, USA
   - Phone: (313) 875-2264
   - Website: [motownmuseum.org](http://www.motownmuseum.org/)

5. **Detroit Zoo**
   - Address: 8450 W 10 Mile Rd, Royal Oak, MI 48067, USA
   - Phone: (248) 541-5717
   - Website: [detroitzoo.org](http://detroitzoo.org/)

6. **Michigan Science Center**
   - Address: 5020 John R St, Detroit, MI 48202, USA
   - Phone: (313) 577-8400
   - Website: [mi-sci.org](http://www.mi-sci.org/)

7. **Charles H. Wright Museum of African American History**
   - Address: 315 E Warren Ave, Detroit, MI 48201, USA
   - Phone: (313) 494-5800
   - Website: [thewright.org](http://thewright.org/)

8. **Belle Isle Aquarium**
   - Address: 3 Inselruhe Ave, Detroit, MI 48207, USA
   - Phone: (313) 331-7760
   - Website: [belleisleconservancy.org](http://www.belleisleconservancy.org/)

9. **Comerica Park**
   - Address: 2100 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48201, USA
   - Phone: (313) 962-4000
   - Website: [detroit.tigers.mlb.com](http://detroit.tigers.mlb.com/det/ballpark/index.jsp)

10. **Museum of Contemporary Art Detroit**
    - Address: 4454 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48201, USA
    - Phone: (313) 832-6622
    - Website: [mocadetroit.org](http://mocadetroit.org/)

These attractions offer a variety of experiences, from art and history to science and outdoor activities.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular restaurants in Detroit that serve Chinese, Indian, Mexican, and Italian cuisines:

### Chinese Restaurants
1. **Bistro Flamme Bois**
   - Average Cost: $100
   - Cuisines: Chinese, Bakery, BBQ
   - Rating: 4.1

2. **DV's Chinese Kitchen**
   - Average Cost: $91
   - Cuisines: Desserts, Pizza, Italian, Bakery, Cafe, Mediterranean
   - Rating: 2.8

### Indian Restaurants
1. **Zabardast Indian Kitchen**
   - Average Cost: $76
   - Cuisines: Bakery, Desserts, Seafood
   - Rating: 4.7

2. **BMG - All Day Dining**
   - Average Cost: $15
   - Cuisines: Desserts, Bakery, BBQ, Indian, Seafood
   - Rating: 4.3

3. **Taksim**
   - Average Cost: $65
   - Cuisines: Cafe, Bakery, Indian, Fast Food
   - Rating: 3.9

### Mexican Restaurants
1. **Chye Seng Huat Hardware**
   - Average Cost: $94
   - Cuisines: Tea, Mexican, Seafood
   - Rating: 3.7

2. **Old Kheer Shop**
   - Average Cost: $54
   - Cuisines: Mexican, Indian, Desserts, Fast Food
   - Rating: 0.0

3. **Knights Chaska**
   - Average Cost: $29
   - Cuisines: Tea, Mexican, Bakery
   - Rating: 2.9

### Italian Restaurants
1. **Cafe And More**
   - Average Cost: $41
   - Cuisines: Tea, Bakery, Italian
   - Rating: 2.9

2. **Sagar Ratna**
   - Average Cost: $55
   - Cuisines: Tea, Indian, BBQ, Italian
   - Rating: 2.7

3. **Rehmatullah's Hotel**
   - Average Cost: $28
   - Cuisines: Desserts, Tea, Pizza, Italian, Mediterranean
   - Rating: 3.0

4. **Turquoise Turkish Ice-cream**
   - Average Cost: $79
   - Cuisines: Fast Food, Tea, Desserts, Italian
   - Rating: 3.4

These restaurants offer a variety of dishes and have received various ratings from patrons. Enjoy your culinary adventure in Detroit!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular attractions in Detroit:

1. **Detroit Institute of Arts**
   - Address: 5200 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48202, USA
   - Phone: (313) 833-7900
   - Website: [dia.org](https://dia.org/)

2. **Detroit Historical Museum**
   - Address: 5401 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48202, USA
   - Phone: (313) 833-1805
   - Website: [detroithistorical.org](http://detroithistorical.org/detroit-historical-museum/plan-your-visit/general-information)

3. **Campus Martius Park**
   - Address: 800 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48226, USA
   - Phone: (313) 566-8250
   - Website: [downtowndetroitparks.com](https://downtowndetroitparks.com/parks/campus-martius/)

4. **Motown Museum**
   - Address: 2648 Berry Gordy Jr. Boulevard, 2648 W Grand Blvd, Detroit, MI 48208, USA
   - Phone: (313) 875-2264
   - Website: [motownmuseum.org](http://www.motownmuseum.org/)

5. **Detroit Zoo**
   - Address: 8450 W 10 Mile Rd, Royal Oak, MI 48067, USA
   - Phone: (248) 541-5717
   - Website: [detroitzoo.org](http://detroitzoo.org/)

6. **Michigan Science Center**
   - Address: 5020 John R St, Detroit, MI 48202, USA
   - Phone: (313) 577-8400
   - Website: [mi-sci.org](http://www.mi-sci.org/)

7. **Charles H. Wright Museum of African American History**
   - Address: 315 E Warren Ave, Detroit, MI 48201, USA
   - Phone: (313) 494-5800
   - Website: [thewright.org](http://thewright.org/)

8. **Belle Isle Aquarium**
   - Address: 3 Inselruhe Ave, Detroit, MI 48207, USA
   - Phone: (313) 331-7760
   - Website: [belleisleconservancy.org](http://www.belleisleconservancy.org/)

9. **Comerica Park**
   - Address: 2100 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48201, USA
   - Phone: (313) 962-4000
   - Website: [detroit.tigers.mlb.com](http://detroit.tigers.mlb.com/det/ballpark/index.jsp)

10. **Museum of Contemporary Art Detroit**
    - Address: 4454 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48201, USA
    - Phone: (313) 832-6622
    - Website: [mocadetroit.org](http://mocadetroit.org/)

These attractions offer a variety of experiences, from art and history to science and outdoor activities.
